PrimeIcons Outline Demo

PrimeIcons 7.0.0 is already installed and configured in your Angular project. Here are some commonly used outline-style icons:

How to Use in Angular Components:

Simply add the icon class to any HTML element:

<i class="pi pi-user"></i> or <span class="pi pi-search"></span>

Basic Outline Icons

User
pi pi-user
Users
pi pi-users
Search
pi pi-search
Heart
pi pi-heart
Star
pi pi-star
Bookmark
pi pi-bookmark

Navigation & Actions

Plus
pi pi-plus
Minus
pi pi-minus
Close
pi pi-times
Check
pi pi-check
Arrow Left
pi pi-arrow-left
Arrow Right
pi pi-arrow-right

Communication & Media

Email
pi pi-envelope

pi pi-phone

pi pi-video

pi pi-camera

pi pi-microphone

pi pi-volume-up

Files & Documents

File
pi pi-file

pi pi-folder

pi pi-download

pi pi-upload

pi pi-image

System & Settings

Settings
pi pi-cog
Home
pi pi-home
Notification
pi pi-bell
Calendar
pi pi-calendar
Clock
pi pi-clock
Lock
pi pi-lock

Angular Component Usage Examples:

In your .component.html:

<button class="btn btn-primary"><i class="pi pi-plus"></i> Add New</button>

<p-button label="Save" icon="pi pi-check"></p-button>

<span class="pi pi-search text-info"></span>

With custom styling:

<i class="pi pi-user" style="font-size: 1.5rem; color: #007bff;"></i>

Note:

All PrimeIcons are designed with an outline/minimal aesthetic by default. The icons shown above are already "outline" style icons. PrimeIcons doesn't have separate filled vs outline variants like some other icon libraries - they maintain a consistent, clean outline appearance throughout.
